name: Sankore Mosque
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and center of Islamic scholarship.

name: Timbuktu Museum
description: Showcases artifacts of Mali's rich cultural history.

name: Tomb of Askia
description: A majestic pyramid-shaped tomb of the Songhai Empire ruler.

name: Djinguereber Mosque
description: One of the oldest mosques in West Africa, built in 1327.

name: The Sahara Gate
description: Iconic gate marking entry to the vast Sahara desert.

name: Salt Caravan Market
description: Where the ancient salt trade lives on.

name: Manuscript Library
description: Houses ancient scientific and religious texts.
